is_delete = 0

SELECT `id`, `number`, `name`, `enable`, `status`, `gmt_create`, `gmt_modified`, `is_delete` FROM busi_device WHERE is_delete = 0 and number = #{number}

SELECT device.`id`, device.`number`, device.`name`, device.`enable`, device.`status`, device.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, device.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, sd.sensor_data sensorData, sd.gmt_upload gmtUpload FROM busi_device device LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bdsd.id,bdsd.device_number,bdsd.sensor_data,bdsd.gmt_upload FROM busi_device_sensor_data bdsd WHERE id IN( SELECT substring_index(GROUP_CONCAT(id ORDER BY gmt_upload DESC),',',1) id FROM busi_device_sensor_data WHERE is_delete = 0 GROUP BY `device_number`) ) sd ON sd.device_number = device.number and device.is_delete = 0
AND ( number LIKE concat('%',#{search},'%') OR name LIKE concat('%',#{search},'%') )
ORDER BY id DESC
